categories.name: Sales channels
categories.description: Sync products with marketplaces, sell on channels, expand distribution.

categories.name: Selling products apps
categories.description: More kinds of products, more ways to pay (custom products, digital goods/services, payments, pricing).

categories.name: Store design apps
categories.description: Tailor your storefront (content, design elements, images/media, product display, etc.).

categories.name: Store management apps
categories.description: Optimize operations and support (finances, operations, security, customer support).

categories.name: Finding products apps
categories.description: Stock your store with products (dropshipping, print-on-demand, wholesale).

categories.name: Orders and shipping apps
categories.description: From checkout to delivery (inventory, orders, returns/warranty, shipping solutions).

categories.name: Marketing and conversion apps
categories.description: Acquire, convert, retain (ads, checkout, loyalty, gifts, promotions, social proof, upsell/bundles).
